targets.rawSQL:
-- grafana-redshift-default-dashboard
SELECT 
    coalesce(query, 0) as query,
    coalesce(userid, 0) as userid,

    coalesce(query_priority, 'N/A') AS priority,
    coalesce(service_class, 0) AS queue,
    coalesce(slot_count, 0) AS slots,

    CASE WHEN state IN ('Dequeued', 'Initialized', 'Invalid', 'Rejected', 'TaskAssigned')
    THEN 'Internal'
    ELSE state 
    END AS state,

    start_time,
    coalesce(queue_time, 0) AS queue_time,
    coalesce(exec_time, 0) AS exec_time,

    coalesce(cpu_time, 0) AS cpu_time,
    coalesce(cpu_time_pct, 0) AS cpu_time_pct,
    coalesce(blocks_read, 0) AS blocks_read,
    coalesce(temp_blocks_to_disk, 0) AS temp_blocks_to_disk,

    coalesce(cpu_skew, 0) AS cpu_skew,
    coalesce(blocks_read_skew, 0) AS blocks_read_skew,

    coalesce(scan_row_count, 0) AS scan_row_count,
    coalesce(total_join_row_count, 0) AS total_join_row_count,
    coalesce(nested_loop_join_row_count, 0) AS nested_loop_join_row_count,
    coalesce(return_row_count, 0) AS return_row_count,
    coalesce(spectrum_row_count, 0) AS spectrum_row_count,
    coalesce(spectrum_scan_size_mb, 0) AS spectrum_scan_size_mb
FROM (
    SELECT * 
    FROM (
        SELECT
            query, query_priority, service_class, slot_count, trim(state) AS state,
            wlm_start_time AS start_time, queue_time, exec_time
        FROM stv_wlm_query_state 
        WHERE query = $query
        UNION ALL
        SELECT
            query, query_priority, service_class, slot_count, 'Finished' AS state,
            service_class_start_time AS start_time, total_queue_time AS queue_time, total_exec_time AS exec_time
        FROM stl_wlm_query 
        WHERE query = $query
    ) AS u
) AS w
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT
        query,
        userid,

        max(cpu_time) AS cpu_time,
        max(cpu_time_pct) AS cpu_time_pct,
        max(blocks_read) AS blocks_read,
        max(temp_blocks_to_disk) AS temp_blocks_to_disk,

        max(cpu_skew) AS cpu_skew,
        max(blocks_read_skew) AS blocks_read_skew,

        coalesce(sum(scan_row_count), 0) AS scan_row_count,
        coalesce(sum(total_join_row_count), 0) AS total_join_row_count,
        coalesce(sum(nested_loop_join_row_count), 0) AS nested_loop_join_row_count,
        coalesce(sum(return_row_count), 0) AS return_row_count,
        coalesce(sum(spectrum_row_count), 0) AS spectrum_row_count,
        coalesce(sum(spectrum_scan_size_mb), 0) AS spectrum_scan_size_mb
    FROM (
        SELECT
            query,
            userid,

            -- query level

            CASE WHEN segment = -1 AND step_type = -1 AND step = -1 AND cpu_time > 0 
            THEN cpu_time
            ELSE NULL END AS cpu_time,

            CASE WHEN segment = -1 AND step_type = -1 AND step = -1 AND cpu_time > 0 AND run_time > 0 AND max_run_time > 2*60*1000000 /* to reduce sampling errors */
            THEN 1.0 * cpu_time / run_time
            ELSE NULL END AS cpu_time_pct,

            CASE WHEN segment = -1 AND step_type = -1 AND step = -1 AND blocks_read > 0 
            THEN blocks_read
            ELSE NULL END AS blocks_read,

            CASE WHEN segment = -1 AND step_type = -1 AND step = -1 AND blocks_to_disk > 0 
            THEN blocks_to_disk
            ELSE NULL END AS temp_blocks_to_disk,

            -- segment level

            CASE WHEN segment > -1 AND step_type = -1 AND step = -1 AND cpu_time > 0 AND max_cpu_time > 0 AND max_run_time > 2*60*1000000 /* to reduce sampling errors */
            THEN 1.0 * max_cpu_time / (cpu_time / slices)
            ELSE NULL END AS cpu_skew,

            CASE WHEN segment > -1 AND step_type = -1 AND step = -1 AND blocks_read > 0 AND max_blocks_read > 0 AND max_run_time > 2*60*1000000 /* to reduce sampling errors */
            THEN 1.0 * max_blocks_read / (blocks_read / slices)
            ELSE NULL END AS blocks_read_skew,

            -- step level

            CASE WHEN segment > -1 AND step_type = 1 AND step > -1 AND rows > 0 THEN rows
            ELSE NULL END AS scan_row_count,

            CASE WHEN segment > -1 AND step_type IN (10, 11, 15) AND step > -1 AND rows > 0 THEN rows
            ELSE NULL END AS total_join_row_count,

            CASE WHEN segment > -1 AND step_type = 15 AND step > -1 AND rows > 0 THEN rows
            ELSE NULL END AS nested_loop_join_row_count,

            CASE WHEN segment > -1 AND step_type = 37 AND step > -1 AND rows > 0 THEN rows
            ELSE NULL END AS return_row_count,

            CASE WHEN segment > -1 AND step_type = 40 AND step > -1 AND rows > 0 THEN rows
            ELSE NULL END AS spectrum_row_count,

            CASE WHEN segment > -1 AND step_type = 40 AND step > -1 AND query_scan_size > 0 THEN query_scan_size
            ELSE NULL END AS spectrum_scan_size_mb
        FROM (
            SELECT 
                query, userid, segment, step_type, step, cpu_time, max_cpu_time, run_time, max_run_time, 
                blocks_read, max_blocks_read, blocks_to_disk, slices, rows, query_scan_size
            FROM stv_query_metrics
            WHERE query = $query
            UNION ALL
            SELECT 
                query, userid, segment, step_type, step, cpu_time, max_cpu_time, run_time, max_run_time, 
                blocks_read, max_blocks_read, blocks_to_disk, slices, rows, query_scan_size
            FROM stl_query_metrics
            WHERE query = $query
        ) AS u
    ) AS s
    GROUP BY query, userid
) AS m USING (query);

panels.description: Query text is limited with the 1st 1000 lines of the query

targets.rawSQL:
-- grafana-redshift-default-dashboard
SELECT
    current_timestamp,
    replace(
        listagg(text, '') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY sequence),
        '\\n', '\n'
    ) AS text
FROM (
    SELECT text, sequence
    FROM stl_querytext
    WHERE query = $query
    ORDER BY sequence
    LIMIT 1000
) AS s;

panels.title: Text

targets.rawSQL:
-- grafana-redshift-default-dashboard
SELECT
    (
        nullif(regexp_substr(plannode, 'cost=[0-9]+\.[0-9]+..([0-9]+\.[0-9]+)', 1, 1, 'e'), '')::numeric -
        nullif(regexp_substr(plannode, 'cost=([0-9]+\.[0-9]+)..[0-9]+\.[0-9]+', 1, 1, 'e'), '')::numeric
    ) AS cost_increase,
    regexp_replace(plannode, ' ', '\\xA0') AS plan_node,
    coalesce(nullif(trim(info), '0'), '') AS info
FROM stl_explain
WHERE query = $query
ORDER BY nodeid, parentid;
